about.summary: Easy-to-use interface to X-13-ARIMA-SEATS, the seasonal adjustment software by the US Census Bureau. It offers full access to almost all options and outputs of X-13, including X-11 and SEATS, automatic ARIMA model search, outlier detection and support for user defined holiday variables, such as Chinese New Year or Indian Diwali. A graphical user interface can be used through the 'seasonalview' package. Uses the X-13-binaries from the 'x13binary' package.

Easy-to-use interface to X-13-ARIMA-SEATS, the seasonal adjustment software by the US Census Bureau. It offers full access to almost all options and outputs of X-13, including X-11 and SEATS, automatic ARIMA model search, outlier detection and support for user defined holiday variables, such as Chinese New Year or Indian Diwali. A graphical user interface can be used through the 'seasonalview' package. Uses the X-13-binaries from the 'x13binary' package.

name: r-seasonal
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.9.0" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-seasonal
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/seasonal_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/seasonal/seasonal_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 40dc25ea890ad6abcabccf12019e1bcffefd925265c2cc14b49a767a7ac4f54e

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-x13binary

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-x13binary

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('seasonal')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('seasonal')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.seasonal.website
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Easy-to-use interface to X-13-ARIMA-SEATS, the seasonal adjustment software by the US Census Bureau. It offers full access to almost all options and outputs of X-13, including X-11 and SEATS, automatic ARIMA model search, outlier detection and support for user defined holiday variables, such as Chinese New Year
    or Indian Diwali. A graphical user interface can be used through the 'seasonalview' package. Uses the X-13-binaries from the 'x13binary' package.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - rluria14
    - ndmaxar
    - RyanHackney
    - conda-forge/r
    - oblute

It offers full access to almost all options and outputs of X-13, including X-11 and SEATS, automatic ARIMA model search, outlier detection and support for user defined holiday variables, such as Chinese New Year or Indian Diwali.
